title: Furnished  ready to move in 2 br 1 bath  close to everything
description:
Gorgeous fully furnished  2 br 1 bath + powder room in Master bedroom, with ample natural light  is awaiting a new tenant in the heart of Northeast Philadelphia.  Central HVAC, on site laundry room across the hall is avaialble from 8AM - 10PM.
2 Minutes walk to transportation, you can even walk to a shopping and dining areas (if you chose to :) ample parking, quiet complex with a beautiful pool and beautiful  landscaping. What a place to call your home!!!
Master bedroom: relax as soon as you walk through the door with a light  beach theme. WOW - lots of closet space- Perfectly sized Walk In Closet, Reach in closet in the powder room, freestanding double door closet, two oversized nightstands with drawers and a smaller accessory drawer tower for your convenience.
Office: We have a work station and a chair ready to help you work  from home. If you wish you can add another bed to turn this room into a guest room or kids room. There is another Reach in closet in the office.
Bathroom: Large bathroom, updated and has a heat lamp for the cold winter months. Right otside of the bathroom there is a linen closet.
Kitchen: Spacious and Ready for a couple or a small family to move right in. Just get your own kettle, pots and pans! Everything else  is ready for you (Cups. plates, mugs, utensils, cooking utensils are all there.) Kitchen has decorative doors, updated has stove, dishwasher, nicely sized fridge, and a pantry closet. Window in the kitchen adds loads of natural light and fresh air if needed.
Dining area: Is right off the kitchen and has a table set for 4 people, with a shelving unit that can hold you.  And yes, another closet right next to the dining are for coats. Also there is a Double door closet with many shelves in Living/Dining are that can be  converted into another closet with hangers.
Living room: A comfy  leatherette  couch, TV stand and decorative shelves make this place feel like home (with a designer's touch)
This unit will not last, with this market it's a catch to find a fully furnished  "turn key" apartment in this are. All you need is a toothbrush, your clothes, Queen Sheet set + towels. Call or Text me today to see this amazing apartment.
Requirements:  our condo board requires all prospective tenants to submit: new tenant application ($25 fee non refundable for pulling credit/bg check for all adults over 18 who will reside),
previous landlord references,
Credit report as
background check
Min 1 year lease
NO PETS OF ANY KIND
No smoking in unit
Once approved  by management, to sign the lease you will  need to bring a 2 months security deposit and after paying your 1st month's rent you get the keys.
We look forward to meeting you soon. Call or Text Olivia to come see this little gem of ours!
CALL(leave a VM if I do not get a chance to answer) or TEXT  to see the unit ASAP

title: top views of washington square park
description:
Don’t miss this fabulous two bedroom 1.5 bath light filled unit facing north east and west. Enter into this amazing unit and the first thing you see are the tree top views of washington square park. Enjoy the abundance of an extra large walk-in closet in the foyer, washer and dryer in the unit with extra storage. There is a large linen closet in hall leading to second bedroom that also has an amazing park view, and a large walk-in closet. The primary suite has two large closets, an east view to enjoy the sunrise plus a south view for the water and bridge-view. This room also has its own 1/2 bath. This building is an amazing place to live. It offers a seasonal roof top pool with an incredible view that you can join for an additional fee. title: OPEN HOUSE: Stunning Almost Brand New Construction Home with Roof Top
description:
2210 Earp St, Philadelphia, PA 19146
Open House: Now
Stunning Almost Brand New Construction Home in Point Breeze with Amazing Center City View from atop the Roof top deck. The premiere residence offers the finest in city living. Featuring 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms. Open Concept first floor, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Enter into the living room and gracious dining room accented with the original exposed brick & custom floating staircase. Gleaming Hardwood Floors & Recessed Lighting throughout the 1st, 2nd & 3rd floors. The Gourmet Kitchen is equipped with all of the amenities you would expect. Magnificent breakfast bar has been crafted with custom waterfall countertop with seating and accented with pendant lighting. Gleaming Quartz countertops accented with beautiful tile & custom cabinetry. All of the Stainless-Steel Appliances are included: GE CAFE Refrigerator, 6 Burner Gas Range, Dishwasher, Built-in Microwave Oven, Hood & Wine Refrigerator. Enjoy cooking your creations with the hood that is vented exterior to the property. Access to rear yard from the sliding glass doors provides additional sunlight & the outdoor area is perfect for grilling & entertaining. title: Don't take a peek, unique home, you probably want a cookie cutter home
description:
Welcome to 7713 Lawnton St, Philadelphia! This well-appointed 2,076 SF, 3 bedroom, 2 full and one-half bath open concept design home boasts a two-story foyer and family room featuring a beautiful butterfly wood staircase. The foyer is flanked by a formal dining room and formal living room, featuring gorgeous hardwoods, shadow box moldings, chair rail and crown molding perfect for entertaining and holidays. The eat-in kitchen has been upgraded with Brazilian cherry hardwood flooring, granite countertops, custom tile backsplash and upscale stainless-steel appliances including range, refrigerator, dishwasher and built-in microwave. Plenty of cabinet and counter space with the 42-inch beautiful Cherry wood cabinetry and room for gathering around the center island offering additional seating. Recessed lighting provides ambience in both the kitchen and family room. Right off the kitchen enjoy access to the large, elevated deck through sliding doors and enjoy the peaceful and private rear yard. The deck provides steps leading into the rear fenced and landscaped level rear yard with play set and fire pit. The bright spacious family room boasts a soaring 17ft vaulted ceiling and flows nicely from the kitchen area, ideal for relaxing evenings by the cozy gas fireplace. The first floor is finished off by a convenient home office with French doors, half bath, main floor laundry room and access to the attached two-bay garage. The second level offers a large primary bedroom suite with a vaulted ceiling, ceiling fan, his and hers walk in closets and a luxurious ensuite bath with upgraded double vanity with granite countertop, large whirlpool jet tub, glass enclosed shower and upgraded fixtures. Three additional roomy and bright bedrooms with ceiling fans share a large hall bath with upgraded double vanity with more granite counters. This home offers a ton of potential for extra living space in the unfinished full lower level that can be finished to include an entertainment area, game room, home theatre or gym and more! This home is close to Linvilla Orchards and Knowlton and Hidden Hollow swim clubs or enjoy strolling Media’s quintessential Main Street just minutes away where there is great local dining shops, and community events held year-round. Make your appointment to see this home today!

title: Welcome to 1133 E Oxford St! This is a spacious 3 bed/ 1 bath .*
description:
Welcome to 1133 E Oxford St! This is a spacious 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom single family home in the heart of Fishtown! Featuring hardwood floors, vintage charm, vibrant colors and accents, amazing woodworking, plus lovely contemporary updates! Enter into the living room, where you'll notice the gorgeous inlaid hardwood flooring, decorative fireplace, and beautifully carved archway leading to the formal dining room. There is great natural light on this level, and built-in shelving is available for added convenience and style. The main floor flows through the dining room into the vintage inspired kitchen. This charming space boasts a vintage porcelain sink with chrome fixtures, white farmhouse style cabinets with classic white handles, checkered floor, and 3 large windows that overlook your tree-lined patio. Continue upstairs with your 3 sunny bedrooms, each offering hardwood floors and closet space. The full bathroom is equipped with tile flooring, built-in shelving, and a subway tiled bath / shower combo. About The Neighborhood: This lovely home is situated on a side street just off Girard Avenue in the heart of Fishtown. Close proximity to Penn Treaty Park and Hetzell Playground. You'll be a short walk from an endless list of some of the city's most popular bars, restaurants, venues, and more! Plus, there's plentiful public transportation options surrounding you, as well as easy highway access, making commuting a breeze!
